  • Method Details

    • fetchOrdersReportData

      public ServerResponseDataContainer fetchOrdersReportData(Connection dbConn, LocalDate startOfLastMonth, LocalDate endOfLastMonth, String branch)
      Fetches the order report data for a given branch and date range.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - The database connection to use for the query.
      startOfLastMonth - The start date of the range to fetch data for.
      endOfLastMonth - The end date of the range to fetch data for.
      branch - The branch for which to fetch the data.
      Returns:
      A ServerResponseDataContainer containing the results of the query, either a map of category quantities or an error message.

    • insertOrdersReportData

      public void insertOrdersReportData(Connection dbConn, HashMap<String,Integer> data, String branch, int year, int month)
      Inserts the order report data into the database for a specified branch and month.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - The database connection to use for the insert operation.
      data - A HashMap containing categories and their corresponding order quantities.
      branch - The branch for which the report is being inserted.
      year - The year for the report entry.
      month - The month for the report entry.

    • fetchPerformanceReportData

      public ServerResponseDataContainer fetchPerformanceReportData(Connection dbConn, LocalDate startOfLastMonth, LocalDate endOfLastMonth, String branch)
      Fetches performance report data for a given branch and date range.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - The database connection to use for the query.
      startOfLastMonth - The start date of the range to fetch data for.
      endOfLastMonth - The end date of the range to fetch data for.
      branch - The branch for which to fetch the data.
      Returns:
      A ServerResponseDataContainer containing the results of the query, either a map of performance metrics or an error message.

    • insertPerformanceReport

      public void insertPerformanceReport(Connection dbConn, HashMap<String,Integer> data, String branch, int year, int month) throws SQLException
      Inserts the performance report data into the database for a specified branch and month.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - The database connection to use for the insert operation.
      data - A HashMap containing performance metrics.
      branch - The branch for which the report is being inserted.
      year - The year for the report entry.
      month - The month for the report entry.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs during the SQL execution.

    • fetchIncomeReportData

      public ServerResponseDataContainer fetchIncomeReportData(Connection dbConn, LocalDate startOfLastMonth, LocalDate endOfLastMonth, String branch)
      Fetches the income report data for a given branch and date range.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - The database connection to use for the query.
      startOfLastMonth - The start date of the range to fetch data for.
      endOfLastMonth - The end date of the range to fetch data for.
      branch - The branch for which to fetch the data.
      Returns:
      A ServerResponseDataContainer containing the results of the query, either a list of SupplierIncome objects or an error message.

    • insertIncomeReport

      public void insertIncomeReport(Connection dbConn, List<SupplierIncome> incomes, String branch, int year, int month)
      Inserts the income report data into the database for a specified branch and month.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - The database connection to use for the insert operation.
      incomes - A list of SupplierIncome objects representing the data to insert.
      branch - The branch for which the report is being inserted.
      year - The year for the report entry.
      month - The month for the report entry.

    • insertCustomersList

      public void insertCustomersList(Connection dbConn, String path) throws SQLException
      Inserts customer and user data into the database from CSV files as an import simulation. This method performs two separate bulk insert operations: - Loads user data from 'Users.csv' into the 'users' table. - Loads customer data from 'Customers.csv' into the 'customers' table. Each CSV file should be properly formatted and located in the specified directory.
      Parameters:
      dbConn - The database connection to use for the insert operations.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs or the SQL statements fail.

      public void setAllUsersLoggedOut(Connection dbConn) throws SQLException
      Throws:
      SQLException
